resources.string: We are a non-profit organization (NPO) in South Africa with a Public Benefit Organization status and Section 18A tax-exempt status. Established in 1999, Lungisa is dedicated to addressing the healthcare and psychosocial needs of vulnerable communities, with a particular focus on children and youth. Guided by the Sustainable Development Goals, particularly Goal 3, Lungisa strives to ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all ages.
To provide quality healthcare and psychosocial services, enhance knowledge and skills among vulnerable community members.

To cultivate a community characterized by:

• High-quality physical well-being
• Psychosocial awareness
• Healthy cultural practices

Empowering communities through culture, education and opportunity. Join us as we create a lasting change, one initiative at a time. Together, we strive to uplift lives and preserve heritage through innovative, community-driven solutions.

Lungisa offers primary healthcare services delievred by professional nurses. These services include: 
 • Management of minor ailments 
 • Baby vaccinations 
 • Management of chronic conditions 
 • Family planning 
 • HIV prevention, awareness, counselling, and testing facilitated by peer educators and HIV counsellors

Lungisa's youth development program empowers young people through: 
 • Life skills training 
 • Extra-mural activities including dance and cultural workshops 
 • Dialogues on relevant and challenging topics 
 • Homework assistance 

 These programs offer opportunities to learn new skills, engage in cultural activities, improve academic performance, and develop healthy coping mechanisms.

Lungisa's qualified social workers provide vital psychosocial therapy to: 
 • Individuals • Families • Couples • Groups 

 This comprehensive approach addresses a wide range of social problems, and the organization provides referrals when specialized care is necessary.

Lungisa recognises the importance of collaboration and actively seeks partnerships with: 

 • Community structures • Other non-governmental organizations (NGOs) 

 This collaborative approach maximizes impact and fosters sustainable community development.
We\'d love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, suggestion, or want to connect, the Lungisa team is here and ready to help.
